main event: A UFO sighting occurred on January 25, 1956, in New Bedford, Massachusetts, described as an elliptical shape, twice the size of a small bird, changing color from red to very white.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2 1/2 minutes., The object was observed at 15,000 feet below an aircraft., The primary witness was a constable., The sighting was visually confirmed with binoculars., The object was possibly related to contrails.
sighted object: one elliptical object changing color from red to very white
witness description: Constable, 34 years old, from New Bedford, MA, employed as a spray painter
